module.sqlWrap: DECLARE @ViewCount BIGINT,@BeSpeakCount BIGINT,@CommentCount BIGINT,@LikedCount BIGINT SELECT @ViewCount = COUNT(LiveVedioId) FROM LiveVedio WHERE VedioId = @VedioId SELECT @BeSpeakCount = COUNT(BeSpeakId) FROM BeSpeakVedio WHERE VedioId = @VedioId SELECT @CommentCount = COUNT(LikedId) FROM VedioLiked WHERE VedioId = @VedioId SELECT @LikedCount = COUNT(CommentId) FROM VedioComment WHERE VedioId = @VedioId INSERT INTO VedioViewCount(VedioId,ViewCount,BeSpeakCount,CommentCount,LikedCount) VALUES(@VedioId,@ViewCount,@BeSpeakCount,@CommentCount,@LikedCount)
UPDATE VedioViewCount SET BeSpeakCount = BeSpeakCount + @BeSpeakCount WHERE VedioId = @VedioId
UPDATE VedioViewCount SET ViewCount = ViewCount + @ViewCount WHERE VedioId = @VedioId
UPDATE VedioViewCount SET LikedCount = LikedCount + @LikedCount WHERE VedioId = @VedioId
UPDATE VedioViewCount SET CommentCount = CommentCount + @CommentCount WHERE VedioId = @VedioId

SELECT COUNT(VedioId) FROM VedioViewCount WHERE VedioId = @VedioId
